message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.DS 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with smoothing techniques in natural language processing tasks. It could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as these fields are closely related to NLP. Additionally, it could be categorized under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as smoothing is an important technique in this field as well. Finally, it could also be classified under cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) as smoothing techniques involve manipulating and analyzing large amounts of data.
